about_the_game:
Cthulhu Detective is a Cthulhu-inspired detective game brought to you by Baichi Studio, combining cutting-edge real-time large language model technology to deliver a twisted and surreal adventure. Step into the shoes of a rookie cop, expecting a routine job, unexpectedly to find yourself plunged into a peculiar world marred by eldritch corruption and AI absurdities

Gameplay and Features:

  • Dynamic Dialogue System: Utilizing advanced large language model technology, every NPC in the game offers highly dynamic, unpredictable conversations. Their conversations can range from profoundly enigmatic to absurdly nonsensical. Players must decipher these complex dialogues to uncover hidden clues.

    “Every playthrough is full of surprises, as NPCs respond uniquely to your questions, you never know what's coming.”

  • Multiple Endings: Your choices will significantly impact the progression and outcome of the game. Each conversation and decision may bring you closer to the truth or plunge you into deeper confusion. Whether you reveal all the truths or remain trapped in the fog depends on your wisdom and judgment.

  • High Freedom: Unlike traditional detective games, Cthulhu Detective offers maps for free exploration. Roam as you please, interrogate NPCs, investigate clues, and carve your path to uncovering the mysteries.

  • Cthulhu-Themed Worldview: The game is set in a Cthulhu-inspired world filled with strange and surreal elements. The environment, storylines and characters are infused with a sense of eerie, supernatural wonder, offering a richly atmospheric experience as you explore. Immerse yourself in a world where reality constantly shifts under the weight of cosmic horror.

  • Mind-Bending Cases & The Thrill of Deduction: Prepare for a series of ingenious puzzles and unexpected twists designed to test your reasoning and creativity. Expose AI suspects by exploiting their logical inconsistencies and bring them to justice!

  • Immersive Adventure Experience: The game’s intricate dialogue system paired with a captivating plot ensures a fresh, immersive approach to the detective genre.

  • More to Discover: With full support for a creative workshop, future updates will let you design your own maps, craft personalized AI characters, and write your own mystery cases.

WARNING! WARNING! WARNING!

All investigators, heed these vital rules. They are your guiding light in the darkness, your shield against the consuming evil:

  • Manage Your Inspiration: Inspiration unlocks the truth, but excess will reveal secrets that shatter the human mind. Balance is key. Master your inspiration to grasp the truth without losing your sanity!

  • Watch Your Sanity: Every step closer to the truth tests your mental fortitude. As your grip on reality weakens, be wary—you might find yourself unable to tell truth from illusion!

Once your mind succumbs to the taint of madness…we▓▓ cannot guarantee☒█※☰ your ██ safety...

Are you ready for an adventure swirled with strangeness? Cthulhu Detective will plunge you into an unpredictable mental labyrinth, test your cognitive limits, and challenge you to uncover the truth in this chaotic world or be completely ensnared by its enigmas.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: violence, blood & gore, partial nudity, and suggestive themes.
